titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation of Members of the Senate in Bahre v. Butler, Case No. 9410917-05 (Super. Ct. Cobb County, Ga.).

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/24/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senators Bob Dole, Sam Nunn, and Paul Coverdell in connection with the subpoenas in Bahre v. Butler.
